title: 美國著名獅子老虎組織發文力撐侵侵！！！

replies.msg:
https://www.instagram.com/p/CJtI8GAjKcL

Dear President Trump;

It has been the Honor of my life to fight besides you from my trench against communism and hate in order to save the world. I can not do anything else except to send you my Energy and Blessings so that you can finish the game. I pray for the billions and billions of people of our Planet that are asleep and do not know what they are doing since they are hypnotized. I have zero doubts that you will fight until we win. Today starts what the millions of your fellow supporters around the world have been waiting for: Judgement Day. I am confident that we got what we need to finish the game and save the world from darkness once and for all. I grew up with Luke Skywalker and Han Solo as my Heroes, they mean nothing compared to you Mr President. You have been accused of being a racist, a fascist, a rapist, a traitor, a children captor, and a crazy person amongst many more ugly accusations, when you have been the only one fighting against all that. What a joy it has been to see you fight against all odds and win since I first saw you at the second Republican debate on 2014 I believe, all the way until this HUGE LAST ELECTION THAT YOU WON LEGALLY ON A LANDSLIDE. It is up to you now Mr President, I wish I could do more to help you but I can’t Sir. You have given millions and millions of us real Hope, and rest assured that we know that you are the greatest leader that Humanity has ever seen. May God allow you today to #SaveOurPlanet from evil, may God allow you to Save The Republic and may God allow you to protect the small Freedom that we still have on this Planet.I have walked besides you all the way to the finish line, but this is as far as we are allowed to go Sir, you will have to cross it alone, like the tremendous leader that you are. May God continue Blessing you Mr President. With Eternal Love, Eternal Gratitude and the utmost respect from one of your most loyal Soldiers. IN TRUMP I TRUST...
#DonaldTrump @realdonaldtrump @donaldjtrumpjr #PapaBearChronicles
